sentences: Brian Rawling is a British record producer and songwriter.
He is the managing director of publisher and production company Metrophonic.
Rawling has produced singles and albums for artists such as Cher, with whom he won a Grammy in 1999 for his work on Believe, Tina Turner, Enrique Iglesias, and One Direction.
Selected production credits1997: This Could Be Heaven by Pandora
Twenty Four Seven by Tina Turner
2003: Sound of the Underground by Girls Aloud
Dreams: The Ultimate Corrs Collection by The Corrs
2011: Up All Night by One Direction
My Happy Place by Emma Bunton
